channel.title: How do you change your SoundCloud name?
channel.description: So I really want to post stuff on SoundCloud but I can't because I have an account under a different name (a stupid one at that) and I was wondering how to change it (or if you even can.)

item.title: How do you change your SoundCloud name?
item.dc:creator: Hern-Meridian
item.source: How do you change your SoundCloud name?

item.title: How do you change your SoundCloud name?
item.dc:creator: IAATOE
item.description:
You can change on a computer by clicking edit on your profile page
